traffic cones.description: A single traffic cone is at the center of the image placed in front of a marked crosswalk on the road.
traffic cones.explanation: The traffic cone might indicate a temporary hazard or construction site, and it is blocking the path directly ahead.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there is a traffic cone present. This traffic cone is located at the center of the scene, placed in front of a marked crosswalk on the road. The presence of the traffic cone could signify a temporary hazard or construction activity nearby. Consequently, it is obstructing the path that would normally be taken by vehicles, suggesting that drivers will need to navigate around it.

1.description and explanation: This object is a traffic cone, typically used in road settings to mark areas where vehicles should not pass or to redirect traffic flow. Because of its placement, this cone indicates that there might be hazards or specific traffic flow adjustments ahead. The cone signals the driver of the ego car to reduce speed and proceed with caution, possibly preparing to navigate around an obstruction or follow a detour.

driving_suggestion: Proceed with caution, reduce speed when approaching the traffic cone, and prepare to either stop or steer around the obstacle, ensuring no traffic regulations are violated. Since it is nighttime and visibility is lower, extra vigilance is necessary to detect any unexpected hazards.
